name: ClickToHarvest
description:
Click to Harvest is a simple farming game. Plant Seed Cards into an empty farm plot and harvest the fruits of your labor once they are grown. The harvested crops can then be used in reseraching new seeds. Don’t ask us how the science behind that works, but trust us, it does! On the market you can sell your leftover crops and buy need seed booster packs. Can you master all crops and reach retirement?

How to play: Click on fully grown crops on your farm plots to harvest them. Grown crops sparkle to let you know they need harvesting. To plant new crops just drag a seed card onto an empty plot.

Follow the link on the left screen border to the reserach tab. Drag crop cards onto different reserach task to fullfill them and unlock new seeds. You get 1 seed as a reward but can buy more seeds from now on in the market

From the farm to right to visit the market. Here you can sell single cards by dropping them on the corresponding circle or sell all cards by pressing the button above. Buy seed booster packs to get 3 random new seeds for your farm. Once you have unlocked higher tier seeds in the reserach, you can buy those seeds in the higher tier packs

Developed in 72 hours by Bitmedic and Noskro to the theme "Harvest"
